game.title: The Lost Artifacts
game.objective: Find and return all the lost artifacts
game.description: You are tasked to find all the lost artifacts of the once powerful kingdom that had been lost in time. These artifacts hold immense power and their recovery is crucial.
game.reward: 500 Gold, +50 XP, and a Sacred Amulet

task.description: Travel to Earth's Scion, a land where an ancient sword awaits.
Brave the deadly abyss of Abyssal Expanse to retrieve the Mystic Shield.
Reach atop Sky's Crown and rescue the Time's Orb guarded by the Celestial Beast.
